resources.string: Interface Tips: 1) Long-press on story item gets full page of options. 2) If > 1 engine provider is detected, press on the bold name to switch. 3) Touch upper left where it currently says \'Contract,\' - this toggles top options panel. It is winking to highlight itself. 4) \'Get More\' menu choice will add 300 more stories to the list. 5) Settings for speech, etc: left Drawer menu under \'More settings\'.
